attributes.action: Inquiry to unfair ticket Distribution for ICC Cricket World cup 2019
attributes.background: I & many of many friends applied for ICC WC 2019 tickets and every time they put us in the queue which always took 30-40 min to enter the site and till that time even all Platinum tickets being showed as sold and the same tickets on the site and these have been shown as proof below

rejection.details: The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for ticket sales for the cricket World Cup. This is the responsibility of the ICC.
